channel.title: inchworms
channel.description: Summer of Coding, one inch at a time...

item.title: Hello, Summer of Code!
item.description:
puts "Hello, Summer of Code!"

Greetings world from @tyranja and @CarlaD.

Accompanied by our ninja coaches @fidothe & @ur5, and jedi mentors @stefanwehrmeyer & @konstantinhaase, we’ll be posting updates here about progress on our Rails Girls Summer of Code projects - Sinatra and farmsubsidys.org.

We’re anticipating a heady summer of coding, committing, and cricket (well, @CarlaD & @fidothe will be fighting over something called The Ashes which we understand to be a tiny old ceramic urn of stump ashes… go figure…)

So, welcome to our blog! We’re super glad to have you along for the ride and can’t wait to get started.

If you want to subscribe via RSS, please grab the blog feed.

Otherwise see you soon!

ps: We built this blog using Github Pages, which uses something called jekyll. Take a peek at the repository if you like :-)
